about.title: About
about.welcomeText2: the capabilities of modern web technologies and system monitoring.
about.welcomeText3: It's a hobby project designed to showcase how web applications can interact with
about.welcomeText4: system resources and provide real-time monitoring capabilities.
about.feedbackText1: Your feedback is valuable and helps improve this project! If you have suggestions,
about.feedbackText2: found any issues, or just want to share your thoughts, please don't hesitate to reach out.
about.feedbackNote: This is a learning project, and every piece of feedback helps make it better.
